en: Each unit can attack only once a turn
Units have weaknesses and advantages - only troops can capture buildings but they have almost no chance against tanks and tanks can’t attack helis
You can deploy soldiers in HQ but it is cheaper to do so in the barracks
A unit loses all its remaining AP for the turn when capturing a Tower
All production buildings require a soldier to maintain it - capturing them will cost you a soldier unit
HQ and captured Towers or Airports will produce cash in every turn
Cash can be spent for deploying units and movement
Use your cash wisely - a big army will be slower and less effective than a small squad
It’s never a good idea to send a unit onto the battlefield alone
Mixing unit types in squads gives you a strategic advantage
You cannot deploy a unit when the spawning point is blocked and neither can the enemy - block enemy factories with your units
Units can attack only adjacent tiles - so when your target is far away you should first move your unit closer
HQ is the most valuable building in game - if you capture the enemy HQ you will win the game

To start new game, use Create button on one of the free slots. If the button is disabled, it means, that you need to download an online map first. Visit https://online.tof.p1x.in to find some! Once you have hosted a game, give the match code to your friend, so they may join.

While in a match, there is no time limit for you, or your opponent, for taking a turn. Remember, that you don't have to wait for your turn idly - you are free to play campaign, skirmish, or load into a different multiplayer match! Quitting the game is also an option, but would you do that?
You are limited to only four match slots, so remember to clear the ones, that have ended.
you may have up to four simultaneous games
